casebody.data:
David S. Geer v. Robert J. Frank et al. J. L. Bennett v. Same.Appeal from the Superior Court of Cook County.Ernest Saunders, attorney for appellants.Young, Makeel & Bradley and Mitchell & Addington, attorneys for appellees.

This case presents only a question as to whether a contract between attorney and client is void, and is affirmed on the principles announced in N. C. St. R. R. Co. v. Ackley, 171 Ill. 113. Affirmed.
